mapper.sql: a.pro_cd AS "proCd", a.en_cd AS "enCd", a.st_dt AS "stDt", a.ed_dt AS "edDt", a.aw_ww AS "awWw", a.ad_ww AS "adWw", a.av_ww AS "avWw", a.irr_gw_ww AS "irrGwWw", a.fi_ww AS "fiWw", a.ai_ww AS "aiWw", a.fish_wu AS "fishWu", a.rh_ww AS "rhWw", a.ff_gw_ww AS "ffGwWw", a.ie_ww AS "ieWw", a.ixe_ww AS "ixeWw", a.io_ww AS "ioWw", a.ic_ww AS "icWw", a.ind_gw_ww AS "indGwWw", a.pbld_ww AS "pbldWw", a.psrv_ww AS "psrvWw", a.p_gw_ww AS "pGwWw", a.du_ww AS "duWw", a.dr_ww AS "drWw", a.d_gw_ww AS "dGwWw", a.eu_ww AS "euWw", a.er_ww AS "erWw", a.e_gw_ww AS "eGwWw", a.lif_ww AS "lifWw", a.agr_ww AS "agrWw", a.ind_ww AS "indWw", a.eco_ww AS "ecoWw", a.tot_w AS "totW", a.ts AS "ts", a.nt AS "nt"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sfrd_wtrplan_rslt( pro_cd, en_cd, st_dt, ed_dt, aw_ww, ad_ww, av_ww, irr_gw_ww, fi_ww, ai_ww, fish_wu, rh_ww, ff_gw_ww, ie_ww, ixe_ww, io_ww, ic_ww, ind_gw_ww, pbld_ww, psrv_ww, p_gw_ww, du_ww, dr_ww, d_gw_ww, eu_ww, er_ww, e_gw_ww, lif_ww, agr_ww, ind_ww, eco_ww, tot_w, nt ) VALUES ( #{proCd}, #{enCd}, #{stDt}, #{edDt}, #{awWw}, #{adWw}, #{avWw}, #{irrGwWw}, #{fiWw}, #{aiWw}, #{fishWu}, #{rhWw}, #{ffGwWw}, #{ieWw}, #{ixeWw}, #{ioWw}, #{icWw}, #{indGwWw}, #{pbldWw}, #{psrvWw}, #{pGwWw}, #{duWw}, #{drWw}, #{dGwWw}, #{euWw}, #{erWw}, #{eGwWw}, #{lifWw}, #{agrWw}, #{indWw}, #{ecoWw}, #{totW}, #{nt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sfrd_wtrplan_rslt SET pro_cd = #{proCd}, en_cd = #{enCd}, st_dt = #{stDt}, ed_dt = #{edDt}, aw_ww = #{awWw}, ad_ww = #{adWw}, av_ww = #{avWw}, irr_gw_ww = #{irrGwWw}, fi_ww = #{fiWw}, ai_ww = #{aiWw}, fish_wu = #{fishWu}, rh_ww = #{rhWw}, ff_gw_ww = #{ffGwWw}, ie_ww = #{ieWw}, ixe_ww = #{ixeWw}, io_ww = #{ioWw}, ic_ww = #{icWw}, ind_gw_ww = #{indGwWw}, pbld_ww = #{pbldWw}, psrv_ww = #{psrvWw}, p_gw_ww = #{pGwWw}, du_ww = #{duWw}, dr_ww = #{drWw}, d_gw_ww = #{dGwWw}, eu_ww = #{euWw}, er_ww = #{erWw}, e_gw_ww = #{eGwWw}, lif_ww = #{lifWw}, agr_ww = #{agrWw}, ind_ww = #{indWw}, eco_ww = #{ecoWw}, tot_w = #{totW}, nt = #{nt} WHERE pro_cd = #{proCd} and en_cd = #{enCd} and st_dt = #{stDt} and ed_dt = #{edDt}
DELETE FROM t_sfrd_wtrplan_rslt WHERE pro_cd = #{proCd} and en_cd = #{enCd} and st_dt = #{stDt} and ed_dt = #{edDt}
